channel.title: Electronics on Bonnee's space
channel.description: A personal blog for projects and thoughts (Electronics)

item.title: GP1095A01A VFD Display datasheet
item.description:
My friend Simone found this gem of a dot-matrix Vacuum Fluorescent Display when tearing down his parents’ old car. The only datasheet we could find was locked in a shitty vBulletin forum that not only required an account in order to open a damn file, but also demanded an user introduction post. So I decided to sign up so you don’t have to.

Fuck them, here’s the datasheet: GP1095A01A.pdf

Bonus link for all VFD junkies.
